name: Box Bots
description:
A puzzle platformer

Control the two bots to manipulate the puzzles and make your way to the top.

Only together can they achieve their goal!

Team Members

Natasha Bianca Mangan - Programming, Level Design, Game Design, UI Design, Music and Sound Effects.

Alex Saleteg - Character Modelling and Animations, Game Design

Moa Bruus - Menu Background, Promo Material

Packs Used
  • Pro Icon Pack by Piontek
  • First Person Puzzle Template by Divivor
  • Storage House Set by Alexander Sychov
